com.github.shynixn.petblocks.core.logic.business.entity

Class DbContext

  • com.github.shynixn.petblocks.core.logic.business.entity.DbContext
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BukkitDBContext, SpongeDBContext

    public class DbContext

    Db Context for holding database connections.

      DbContext()
      Db Context for holding database connections.

      Executes the given update sql statement.
